column2: left_join(pin %>% select(admin3_pcode, target = fs_targeted), by = c("admin3_pcode_old" = "admin3_pcode"), .groups = "drop") %>%
select(state, township, target, beneficiaries, `%_beneficiaries` = pc_beneficiaries, `%_reached` = pc_reached) %>%
pander(caption = "Townships reached by number of beneficiaries")
